about.title: About Junior UA
about.intro: Junior UA connects juniors in Ukraine with curated jobs, events, and a community that wants them to grow.
about.sectionMissionBody: We collect transparent opportunities, highlight supportive teams, and give early-career talent confidence that every listing was reviewed by humans.
about.sectionAudienceBody: Students, career switchers, and first-job hunters who need a single trustworthy feed of openings, meetups, and learning moments across Ukraine.

privacy.title: Privacy
privacy.intro: We keep the product simple and only store data that helps us operate the site and measure interest.
privacy.dataSectionBody: When you browse the site we log basic analytics, crash reports, and any content you send us such as job tips or event forms.
privacy.cookiesSectionBody: We use minimal cookies/local storage to remember your language and detect abuse. Third-party tracking scripts are opt-in and disabled by default.

terms.title: Terms of use
terms.intro: By using Junior UA you agree to be respectful, share accurate information, and not misuse the platform.
terms.usageSectionBody: Listings are provided for personal career exploration. Do not scrape, spam, or resell the data without permission.
terms.liabilitySectionBody: Junior UA curates content but cannot guarantee completeness. Always double-check details with the original organizer or employer.
